title: Critiquing 'Game of Thrones' and Previewing the Fall TV Season (Ep. 178)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald unpack Sunday night’s 'Game of Thrones' episode, "Beyond the Wall," and critique some of the show's mechanics (1:00). Then Chris and Andy discuss what they are looking for in the upcoming fall TV season (33:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
